page.title: 12The Parish Council
page.content: Apart from the usual topics always under discussion there are two major projects to be considered by The Parish Council 1985/6. The first is the construction of two bedroomed bungalows for senior citizens on land owned by the village in Towrise. A public meeting has been held and it was agreed to go ahead with the project.These homes will first be offered to residents of Sulgrave, living in three bedroomed council houses.This should then release the larger houses for younger families. The other project is the provision of children's playground equipment on the playingfield in Towrise.Some parents are liasing with the Parish Council and enquiries are being made about possible grants.Extra funds will need to be raised by the village.
